column4: Help! I've got an ubuntu machine with 2 hard drives: one is slave. I did an update, and the system said something about a bad superblock... and the machine would not reboot. So I resintalled Feisty. I'm trying to mount that second hard drive, but am having trouble seeing it anyplace can somebody tell where I should look? Is it in /dev/hda1 or something like that?
sudo fdisk -l will show all the partitions you have
Thank you. It looks like it is hdb. I'll try to mount it. Thank you so much. Phil Smith Duluth, GA
it won't be hdb by itself, but probably hdb1
